thread.title: They Said What?!: Find Out What Neil deGrasse Tyson, Penn Jillette, And Bindi Irwin Have To Say
thread.title_full: They Said What?!: Find Out What Neil deGrasse Tyson, Penn Jillette, And Bindi Irwin Have To Say

title: They Said What?!: Find Out What Neil deGrasse Tyson, Penn Jillette, And Bindi Irwin Have To Say
text: Like Ever wonder what’s on the mind of today’s most notable people? Well, don’t miss our unbelievable roundup of the best and most talked about quotes of the day: “ When you think about how small the oceans are compared to the vastness of space, it’s hard to think of marine biologists as anything but cowards. ” —Neil deGrasse Tyson On the sciences “ Magic is the only profession where you can cut a beautiful woman in half and be applauded for it. ” —Penn Jillette On why he chose to become a magician “ The best way to tell alligators and crocodiles apart is by screaming. If you look directly at an alligator and scream ‘Alligator!’ someone will usually come and kill the alligator. With crocodiles, though, someone will come to kill them but the crocodile will usually eat them first. Easy! ” —Bindi Irwin
